title: Oceanic Open Ladder - Split 2 is live!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/SKUhvKZ.jpg

**Hey there Summoners!**

Rusty here once again with an update on the state of the Oceanic Open Ladder (OOL)! For those of you tuning in for the first time, the OOL is the semi-pro ladder for teams looking to qualify for the Oceanic Challenger Series and one day shoot for qualification into the Oceanic Pro League.

Below you can find how to join the second split of OOL action.

**_The week starting the 6th of June, the second split of the Oceanic Open Ladder (OOL) will officially commence. The two day tournament will take place every fortnight, Saturday and Sunday . There will be four tournaments total throughout the duration of the OOL, with one playoff week to round it out and crown the winners. Winners will get their shot at making it into the Challenger League (OCS), and as such, eventually the Oceanic Pro League (OPL)._**

Last split we saw 2 of our top teams, Abyss Black & Sin Fighto, qualify into the Oceanic Challenger Series (OCS) to compete for their shot into the OPL. The breeding grounds of the OOL saw **69 unique teams** competing throughout, with **29 of those playing in more than 1 week**, consecutively or not.

This will be an opportunity for anybody to enter,** with a natural edge towards the most competitive and consistent players and teams.**  Every second weekend will see the action resume, with dates available on our Leagues Page, or our OOL Battlefy Website (Where you also sign up).
 
**How can I sign up?**

Your Path to Pro can  be found [on Battlefy here!](https://battlefy.com/riot-games-oceanic-open-ladder)
The first two weeks are available now, with the rest to be added per tournament completion.
 
**What is the schedule?**

Week 1 Tournament (June 11 ~ June 12)
Week 2 Tournament (June 25 ~ June 26)
Week 3 Tournament (July 9 ~ July 10)
Week 4 Tournament (July 23 ~ July 24)
Week 5 Playoff Tournament  (August 6 ~ 7)
Promo/Relo (August 27 ~ 28)
 
**Is there still Prizing?**

Prizes shown are per player:

**1st** – 3200 RP + Triumphant Ryze
**2nd** – 2800 RP
**3rd** – 2100 RP
**4th** – 1100 RP
**5th-8th** – 800 RP
**9th-16th** – 500 RP

**How do I qualify to the OCS?**

Your way to qualifying into the Challenger Series is by accruing points. The points system will be decided on placements in both days of action. 

**Preliminaries (Day 1) Points**

1st – 20 points
2nd – 15 points
3rd – 10 points
4th – 5 points
5th – 0 points

**Playoffs (Day 2) Points**

1st Place – 90 points
2nd Place – 60 points
3rd Place – 40 points
4th Place – 30 points
5 ~ 8th Place – 20 points
9th ~ 16th Place – 10 points
17th ~ 32nd Place – 5 points

For those who need to find the rules for competing within the OOL, they can be found here!
[Rules!](http://news.cdn.leagueoflegends.com.s3.amazonaws.com/public/riot-oce/2016OOLRulesv1.0.pdf)

Further details or confirmation on dates, prizes  and structure, can be found on our league page below!
[Leagues Page!](http://oce.lolesports.com/articles/oceanic-open-ladder-54687)

If that doesn’t quite cut it, the Battlefy website once again has all of your needs fulfilled.
[OOL Website!](https://battlefy.com/riot-games-oceanic-open-ladder)
 
Thanks a bunch and best of luck on the Rift. I’ll be around to answer questions as much as possible up until the events start!

Cheers,

Rusty.

replies.body: Too bad i'm bronze V and never gonna be able to be good enough to play in these.

Assuming that a team is put together, how is the game organized on the day of the game? Is it monitored by Riot staff or anything like that? Also I was wondering, and sorry if this was mentioned, I didn't see it, is there a price for entry or is it completely free? Can we sign up multiple times for example signing up the same team for a Week 1 Tournament and a Week 4 Tournament?

Thanks, this is the first time i've considered doing something like this, information would be great!

* It's monitored by the website as well as the two admins I have working on the tournament! Myself where applicable also, naturally :)
* The entry is completely free sir! 
* The same team can sign up for weeks 1 2 3 and 4, as points being accrued throughout is quite valuable!

Best of luck if you wish to compete also!
The more new faces, the better :D
Is the prize for each week's tournament or all the week's combined?
The prizes above are per person, per week!
Hi plat 5 Jungler OCE here, message me name is Cripple , willing to join a team if need can play other roles if required
hi everyone , i am looking for a team i main support more than 3 years so please if you need support add me and you can try out thanks
Looking for team diamond 4 top/support main hit me up wallah {{item:3902}}

> [{quoted}](name=ChickenFrog,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=QWlKgKYq,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-06-07T04:26:11.909+0000)
>
> Looking for team diamond 4 top/support main hit me up wallah {{item:3902}}

Best place to look for a team/teammate is the Team Recruitment sub-board. If you haven't found anyone yet, give that a shot!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment

This is actually really nice of Rito to do this.

What's the catch?..

No catch sir :)
Simply a great chance to get a team together and play some clean oceanic esports.

Hey all been diamond for two seasons now (stuck in plat now the grind is real) looking for a semi-serious team to go with for fun and competitiveness. Main supp/mid/jg but happy to fill. {{item:3113}}

Hey there
I am a plat 5 this season so far since I managed to obtain a decent internet provider.
Main top/adc.
I like your idea of semi-serious team.
Let me know if you're interested

Hey Summoners!!! I'm looking for a Ranked 5's Team... Main ADC and Mid and Play Support well. Also Decent Jungler and Top... I have reached Platinum 1 in season 4 and quit in season 5... I just started playing  last year in December and reached silver 1. My Schedules are flexible so i can join you guys anytime during training and i adapt quicky to any strategy. Hopefully this post will get a positive feedback because i can't make a team around my place due to people being very busy.
Is the Rp given based on the what place u are in day 2?
Correct! Making it to day 2 puts you in the running for RP placements!
Been playing since season 1, Main support. PM in game, if you want to try me out.
Hey guys! I'm hot for it and i'm looking for a team! I have like near 2300-2500 victories and i'm up to play every lane! Just want to participate and having fun in a tournament! :D

Plat 2 Adc main
Can fill jg, mid
Looking for a team add me
Plat 1 (ex-diamond S5) main bot (adc/sup) but happy to fill if needed. Looking for team :D
There was a little bit of a misunderstanding last OOL. Will the finals only be played out by the top 2 teams or will there be a larger scale of top teams?

The finals will now be a top 8 bracket! 
It has been changed since the last split of the OOL, I made a mistake in organising the final the last time around.
Thanks for asking!
